scripts.all: yarn codegen && yarn build && yarn index && yarn deploy
scripts.prepare: mustache network.beam.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; rm -f ./src/configs/config.ts; cp ./src/configs/config.beam.ts ./src/configs/config.ts
scripts.index: yarn prepare; graph create beamswap --node http://134.209.137.164:8020
scripts.deploy: yarn prepare; graph deploy beamswap --node http://134.209.137.164:8020 --ipfs http://134.209.137.164:5001
scripts.all:test: yarn codegen:test && yarn build:test && yarn index:test && yarn deploy:test
scripts.prepare:test: mustache network.beam-testnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; rm -f ./src/configs/config.ts; cp ./src/configs/config.beam-testnet.ts ./src/configs/config.ts
scripts.index:test: yarn prepare:test; graph create beamswap --node http://161.35.246.70:8020
scripts.deploy:test: yarn prepare:test; graph deploy beamswap --node http://161.35.246.70:8020 --ipfs http://161.35.246.70:5001
